name: KAUTALA FRIENDS' SPORTING CLUB
briefDescription: Kautala Friends Sporting Club is remarkably known as a social welfare organization situated in Village-Kautala, Mathurapur Block-II, South 24 Parganas, West Bengal working for people of rural area.Ou Core activities:Conducting Nursery and KG school,Adolescentsâ€™ Health and life skill education,Nutrition development through integrated approach,sports, Cultural progm.,Running 10 bedded hospital named Ashakiran with pharmacy, pathological laboratory, USG Center,Sanitation development like promotion of low cost latrine, smokeless Chula, napkin making and community incinerator making.,Basic health care support which includes mother and child health, adolescents and geriatric health.
